author: dwoods
msg: GERONIMO-1285 Deployer does not list all modules that have been stopped
Slight rework, to remove the extraneous updateStatus() calls when processing the childs.
Also updated StopCommand to display "Module <id> is already stopped" instead of treating it as a failure.

author: evenisse
msg: o xmlrpc service runs now in a servlet and don't use a specific port
o the client use the xmlrpc client factory to simplify the client code

author: rfeng
msg: Fix the version for the plugin

author: pcl
msg: OPENJPA-230. Updated patch based on an out-of-band patch from Vishal. This version avoids interrupts while still handling guaranteed delivery of messages in the queue.
